page.title: 04THE RIVER AXE,WOOKEY HOLE
page.content:
THE RIVER AXE GOES UNDERGROUND AT PRIDDY,FLOWS THROUGH WOOKEY HOLE CAVES AND BY THE CAR PARK AND PICNIC AREA. IT FLOWS OVER LOTS OF STONES AND WEEDS BUT THERE ARE FEW FLOWERS. IN THE STREAM THERE ISN'T MUCH WATER-LIFE TO BE SEEN BECAUSE IT WOULD PROBABLY BE HIDING IN THE WEEDS.IT IS NICE AND PEACEFUL TO JUST SIT BY THE RIVER AND LISTEN TO THE RUNNING WATER.
LOCAL BOYS ENJOY FISHING IN THE RIVER BY THE CAR PARK AND AT TROUTS' BEND WHERE THE RIVER GENTLY WANDERS ALONG WITH DEEPS AND SHALLOWS, LINED BY TREES AND ECHOING THE SOUNDS OF BIRDS. ON AND ON, GOES THE RIVER, PAST FIELDS AND HEDGES,GRAZING CATTLE AND PEACEFUL SOMERSET SCENERY.
